Uses of Interface
com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains.Domain

  • Packages that use Domain 
    Package Description
    com.quinsoft.zeidon
    Provides all the standard classes and interfaces necessary for client applications written in Zeidon.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler
    Provides all the implementations of Zeidon DB handlers.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains
    Contains all the standard Zeidon domains.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.objectdefinition
    The classes that are used at runtime to define Zeidon LODs and applications.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.standardoe
    Provides the standard Java implementation of the com.quinsoft.zeidon interfaces.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Domain Application.getDomain(String name)
      Get the domain by name for this application.

      A subclass of StringDomain that is aware of the case-sensitive flag in the AttributeDef.

      A version of DateTimeDoman that will initialize an attribute to the current time.
      class  DateDomain 
      class  DateTimeDomain
      This domain handles any differences needed to deal with dates+time.
      class  DoubleDomain
      Decimal domain, which stores values as Double.
